plot: Three different women named Maria. Each one has their own problems that they are trying to fix. The decision of each one affects the life of the others, and the life of the neighborhood.
title: Tres Marias
plot_es: Three different women named Maria. Each one has their own problems that they are trying to fix. The decision of each one affects the life of the others, and the life of the neighborhood.
plot_en: Three different women named Maria. Each one has their own problems that they are trying to fix. The decision of each one affects the life of the others, and the life of the neighborhood.
